mapper.insert: insert into guestbook(seq, email, password, content, logtime) values(guest_seq.nextval, #{email}, #{password}, #{content}, sysdatetime)
mapper.select: SELECT G.seq, G.email, G.content, decode(to_char(G.logtime, 'yyyymmdd'), to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd'), TO_CHAR(G.logtime, 'hh:mi:ss'), TO_CHAR(G.logtime, 'yy.mm.dd')) logtime, IF(M.seq, decode(to_char(M.moditime, 'yyyymmdd'), to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd'), TO_CHAR(M.moditime, 'hh:mi:ss'), TO_CHAR(M.moditime, 'yy.mm.dd')), decode(TO_CHAR(G.logtime, 'yyyymmdd'), to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd'), TO_CHAR(G.logtime, 'hh:mi:ss'), TO_CHAR(G.logtime, 'yy.mm.dd'))) modilog FROM guestbook G, modifytime M WHERE G.seq=M.seq(+) ORDER BY G.logtime DESC;
mapper.update: MERGE INTO modifytime USING guestbook ON(guestbook.seq=modifytime.seq) WHEN matched THEN UPDATE SET modifytime.moditime=sysdatetime WHERE modifytime.seq=#{seq} WHEN NOT matched THEN INSERT VALUES (guestbook.seq, SYSDATETIME);
